mainSection.title: Frontend Web Developer
mainSection.subtitle: Everything is possible in the world of programming, that's why it's my passion.

aboutme.greeting: Hi, I’m Ignacio. Nice to meet you.
aboutme.description: I´m a Frontend Web Developer who works with modern technologies that allow building robust and attractive web applications. In my spare time, I like to work on personal projects and I´m eager to continue developing my skills to contribute to the success of projects in the future.
aboutme.tech: I have experience using React, Angular, and Node.js. I'm familiar with relational databases like SQL and non-relational databases like MongoDB. Also, I'm comfortable working with design frameworks like Material UI and using Tailwind CSS to create modern, responsive interfaces.

proyects.title: My proyects
proyects.description: Some of the personal projects I have been working on recently.
proyects.twitter: Twitter clone with its main functionalities. The technologies used in this proyect were React, Node Js and Mongo DB.
proyects.thalamus: Thalamus is a global SaaS marketing platform to connect your company with consumers, retailers, sales force and distributors.

contact.title: Contact
contact.thanks: Thank you for contacting me, I will be responding to you via email in the next few hours.
